is a village situated 75 miles south of the Malawi/Tanzania border at Karonga, and 90 miles from the capital of the north, Mzuzu.
Next to the village of Chitimba there is a campsite that is perfect for staying at a couple of nights. The campsite also has a number of rooms available.
There is a campsite restaurant providing breakfast, lunch and dinner.
There is a campsite bar selling beer, spirits and soft drinks.
There is a campsite with spaces to pitch tents and there are clean outdoor showers and bathrooms. There are also 4 en-suite rooms, 2 double rooms, 7 twin rooms, 8 single rooms and a mixed dorm room.
